plot: During the rest of Vicki's "Winter Wonderland" party, confrontation is the common theme. While Gretchen and Heather argue, Alexis's hubby Jim faces the ladies for the first time all season, and even Briana's husband, Ryan, verbally attacks a guest. Tamra and Gretchen continue to accuse one another of deception, and Vicki and Lydia ambush Slade for his public insults.—Anonymous
